Pre-Game Insights: Bafana Bafana is on the verge of securing their qualification for next year’s Africa Cup of Nations
Victory set to secure them qualification for next year’s continental showpiece in Morocco
Bafana and Uganda are level on 7 points after three matches
Congo-Brazzaville are on 3 points from their three matches
South Sudan are yet to register a victory
Bafana coach Hugo Broos expressed concern about the synthetic pitch
Broos mentioned past bad experiences with synthetic pitches, specifically the one in Rwanda
The pitch must be good for Bafana to play their best football
Bafana will prepare for a difficult game but aim to achieve their level and play with the same mentality
